verbose_text: Graphite, graphene oxide, microbially reduced graphene oxide, and chemically reduced graphene oxide were prepared, and 15 mL of a 0.5 mg/mL solution of each sample was vacuum filtered (Vacuum Filtration Unit Buchner Medium 60 mL Frit Funnel 250 mL Erlenmeyer Flask) through a 0.2 mum PTFE filter (Whatman, PTFE membrane filters).
evidence: Graphite, graphene oxide, microbially-reduced graphene oxide
